column4: hi everyone, I have installed gutsy and in adept, I enabled teh universe n multiverse repos and when I go to reload, adept gets stuck on "Waiting for Headers (40%)" and doesnt move, still the same after rebooting, and changing servers etc, anyone know what might be causing this
could be the servers are being pounded heavily
these days
is your connection working for other things?
yes, everything else works fine, I have tried changing to different servers, I tried a few hours ago and waited for a while, still doing teh same thing
does it start to download anything at all?
it gets to 40% done downloading headers
hmm
well, "waiting for headers"
can you connect to that particular mirror with a browser?
o I'll try , one sec
yeah I can connect with a browser. I have tried switching to diff mirrors also
odd
are you doing it from console?
adept, I also tried in the console earlier
I'm sorry I don't know
okeyy thanks  8-]
reducing the MTU helps me sometimes
sudo ifconfig eth0 mtu 576
oh yeah alright thnx,
but that would imply having a lousy connection
yerr neighbours wifi gets kinda dodgy sometimes
